definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: We hope you can show us the certificate issued by the Health Office.
sentences.chinese: 希望你方能提供已經檢疫所簽發的證書。

sentences.english: However, as seeing the past, we should realize what we get now is not easily come by.
sentences.chinese: 回首過往，方能讓人瞭解到眼前的得來不易。

sentences.english: Abide, friend, your mother bided till you were born.
sentences.chinese: 堅持啊朋友，母親善堅持，你方能出世。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Zhishi Xiaopi Decoction" is effective to improve the gastrointestinal dysfunction in severe patients.
sentences.chinese: 結論枳實消痞方能改善危重病患者胃腸道障礙。

sentences.english: Only when your mind is proper, great, and bright can you shine right through all the darkness!
sentences.chinese: 所以心要正大光明，方能照破一切黑暗。

sentences.english: A law should be amended or repealed only by the same procedures that were used to enact it.
sentences.chinese: 法律只有經其頒佈之同樣程序方能被修正或廢除。

sentences.english: If you appoint us as your general agent, the turnover will be greatly increased.
sentences.chinese: 如果你方能委任我方爲總經理，營業額將大幅度增長。

sentences.english: The formula of DZXW can decrease the level of the malonic dialdehyde in brains of the mice obviously.
sentences.chinese: 定志小丸方能明顯降低小鼠腦內丙二醛的含量。

sentences.english: As your specifications are not quite clear to us, we should ask you to furnish us with more details.
sentences.chinese: 由於你方的規格不太清楚，希望你方能告具體細節。

sentences.english: A day is a tourist; a year is a traveller.
sentences.chinese: 一天只能走馬看花，一年方能稱之旅人。

sentences.english: Wild City hundred famous when people can and Hengyang Zero Distance "face to face"?
sentences.chinese: 雁城百道名菜何時方能與衡陽百姓零距離“面對面”？

sentences.english: The world person unites as one, then can become all-powerful.
sentences.chinese: 天地人合一，方能成通天。

sentences.english: When I am in the sea flounder I tell an own bitterness to to the utmost then can be sweet.
sentences.chinese: 當自己在題海中掙扎時自己通知本身苦盡方能甘來。

sentences.english: Drive friendly and courteously and have a safe and nice journey.
sentences.chinese: 友好並謹慎地駕駛方能有個安全而又舒適的旅程。

sentences.english: You earn your respect and win your titles when it counts.
sentences.chinese: 球員在關鍵時分的發揮方能爲他們贏得尊重和名譽。

sentences.english: It is hoped that you would seriously take this matter into consideration and let us have your reply soon.
sentences.chinese: 希望你方能認真考慮這件事，並儘快答覆我們。

definition: the one and only way/the only proper course to take
to come unscathed through a hundred battles (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to win every fight
know yourself, know your enemy (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])
not a single one is dispensable/can't do without either
(literary) what is?/what is the meaning of?
key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind
